text: Little Sisters of the Poor Home for the Aged may refer to: *Little Sisters of the Poor Home for the Aged (Minneapolis, Minnesota), listed on the National Register of Historic Places (NRHP) *Little Sisters of the Poor Home for the Aged (Nashville, Tennessee), listed on the NRHP in Nashville, Tennessee *St. Sophia Home of the Little Sisters of the Poor, Richmond, Virginia, listed on the NRHP in Richmond, Virginia *Home for the Aged Men and Women (Washington, DC), former, located on H Street NE
title: Little Sisters of the Poor Home for the Aged
